verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of David.<WH1732> Lord,<WH3068> who<WH4310> shall abide<WH1481> in your tabernacle?<WH168> who<WH4310> shall dwell<WH7931> in your holy<WH6944> hill?<WH2022>
He that walks<WH1980> uprightly,<WH8549> and works<WH6466> righteousness,<WH6664> and speaks<WH1696> the truth<WH571> in his heart.<WH3824>

He that backbites<WH7270> not with his tongue,<WH3956> nor<WH3808> does<WH6213> evil<WH7451> to his neighbor,<WH7453> nor<WH3808> takes<WH5375> up a reproach<WH2781> against<WH5921> his neighbor.<WH7138>
In whose eyes<WH5869> a vile<WH959> person is contemned;<WH959> but he honors<WH3513> them that fear<WH3373> the LORD.<WH3068> He that swears<WH7650> to his own hurt,<WH7489> and changes<WH4171> not.

He that puts<WH5414> not out his money<WH3701> to usury,<WH5392> nor<WH3808> takes<WH3947> reward<WH7810> against<WH5921> the innocent.<WH5355> He that does<WH6213> these<WH428> things shall never<WH3808> <WH5769> be moved.<WH4131>
